caption: The video begins with a conversation between a woman and her boss. The two seem to be having an intense discussion about something. The scene then shifts to a man who also appears to be anxiously searching for something. He approaches the woman and seeks her assistance regarding some information. After their exchange, the man hastily drives away. Soon after he leaves, a group of individuals breaks into his home. It seems the man had anticipated this. Later, the man goes to the residence of the leader of this group and, at gunpoint, forces him to hand over a safe. This safe appears to contain crucial information.
